response.original_title: Shalom Sesame - Mitzvah on the Street
response.overview: When a storm makes a mess of the neighborhood, everyone lends a helping hand. In the meantime, Grover is invited to a Bar Mitzvah in Jerusalem. Come join Matisyahu and Oofnik as they beat box the Hava Nagila.
response.title: Shalom Sesame - Mitzvah on the Street
